update.description: The build directory for gazebo jobs is eating tons of disk space and we rarely use the building information in there. Let's try to clean it after build, install, tests and generate the needed artifacts.
update.title: Clean build gazebo directory

content.raw: Looks like the [new jobs are running just fine](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/) and just need a bunch of Mbs.
content.html: Looks like the new jobs are running just fine and just need a bunch of Mbs.
